entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Permit loading Explicit layouts with generics constrained to unmanaged #97526
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Extra flags on tree"' during 'Post-Morph' #97524
    9.0.0
  • Libraries work to support Cloud Native effort for .NET 9 #97522
    9.0.0
  • [browser] System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests - abort early #97518
    9.0.0
  • Error ! .Net 8 Maui Cannot run some machines, but .Net 6 can run these machines, now you force update vs 2022 to use .net8 ,it give me big trouble！！！！！！！ #97516
  • The RuntimeIdentifier platform 'browser-wasm' and the PlatformTarget 'x64' must be compatible #97515
  • [browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null #97513
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow replace ArrayPool<T>.Shared to custom pool #97512
  • [browser] System.Text.Json.Serialization - OutOfMemoryException #97500
    9.0.0
  • The `m_CallConv` of `System.String::Ctor` is inconsistent with `System.String::.ctor` #97499
    Future
  • Logging source generator fails to compile if class has [DynamicallyAccessedMembers] #97498
    9.0.0
  • windows .net core console hang on unhandled exception #97496
  • [API Proposal]: Add left join #97492
    Future
  • `JsonNode.DeepEquals()` erroneously considers number representation #97490
    Future
  • Transitive KeydService #97489
    9.0.0
  • Convert Remaining Tests to the Merged Wrapper System #97486
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Interlocked.CompareExchange for byte/short/sbyte/ushort #64658
    9.0.0
  • dotnet/runtime fails to build on Ubuntu 22.04 with /p:PortableBuild=false #97521
  • RuntimeILGenerator emits bad IL for Ldc_I4 with values >= -128 and <= 127 #97520
  • JIT: Loop alignment related assertion failure during 'Generate code' #97376
  • Regex evaluation bug - discrepancy between compiled and non-compiled regex #97455
    9.0.0
  • ./build.sh --test fails to find 'xunit.console.dll' #97470
  • ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync hangs if the response content is buffered. Is this expected behavior? #97502
  • Use the `CMAKE_<LANG>_BYTE_ORDER` setting instead of manually detecting endianness or using the `TestBigEndian` module (currently used by Mono) #97423
  • The "Build / browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_EAT" leg's build fails with "Nothing to show. Final logs are missing." #97117
  • Q: How to use LTO when using AOT? #97501
  • [RISC-V] relocation truncated to fit: R_RISCV_JAL against symbol `ThrowExceptionHelper' #97337
  • [API Proposal]: Add `IPAddress`, `IPEndPoint`, `DnsEndPoint`, `PhysicalAddress` json built-in converters #97494
  • Missing `GTF_ASG` and `GTF_ALL_EFFECT` on GenTree nodes. #13758
    9.0.0
  • GC/API/Refresh/Refresh failing in outer loop runs #97437
  • GcMemoryInfo returns incorrect values in .NET 8 on macOS 14 Sonoma #94846

PullRequests

Created

  • Use non locking atomic intrinsics #97527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-preview1] Revert late cast expansion #97525
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default loop peeling phase #97517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Disable inlining into bblocks that are detected as dead early during codegen #97514
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][tvos] Disabling crashing System.Linq tests on tvos #97511
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Do not perform fast tail call when function need GSCookie check #97510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Factor loop duplication code #97506
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][mt] Fix System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel build #97505
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Delete some CompatibilitySuppressions #97503
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix problem with fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #97493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove most fgConnectFallThrough calls #97488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark all base types and interfaces as RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

Merged

  • update SIGKILL hint msg #97519
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete some dead code in CoreLib #97504
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE_DD_2A & SVE_DG_2A #97446
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Change allocation of `MethodData` structures to do less unnecessary work #96857
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Only skip Native AOT for crossgen in non-portable build #97523
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix handling of capture groups inside of negative lookarounds #97463
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [NativeAOT] Clean up some win-x86 bit rot #97495
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] enable more tests #97391
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Move AppWithCustomEntryPoints ond ComponentWithNoDependencies to pre-built test assets #97477
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [ci] Try to fix the hangs on the browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_E… #97491
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow TernaryLogic to optimize down to BlendVariableMask where appropriate #97468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Linux/ARM bring-up (4/n) #97269
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] dead code #97497
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix maui link #97509
    area-Meta
  • [RISC-V] Added designated output instruction emitters #96741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Change the now Deprecated TEST_BIG_ENDIAN to CMAKE_C_BYTE_ORDER #97426
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Set FlagNetStandard1XDependencies=true and fix issues #96795
    needs-area-label
  • Bump to new Ubuntu 22.04 queue for PPC64 #97451
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow users passing FILE_FLAG_BACKUP_SEMANTICS as FileOptions #97471
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Hash code tests cleanup #97299
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, test-enhancement
  • [RISC-V] GCC crosscompile fixes #97445
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Clean up gtCloneExpr #97411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve call args interference checking when stores are involved #97409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Restrict Refresh test platforms #97439
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add a few more repos in contributing #97485
    area-Meta
  • Cleanup dspRegMask to allow sharing the main loop #97459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix computing available memory on OSX for GC #97102
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Build Mac symbols in .dSYM bundle, not single .dwarf file #96456
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoiding loading and processing same cert file to improve cold start performance … #97267
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Enhance OSX's ProcessManager to extract process names from their paths #96287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Convert Array.CopySlow to managed #97202
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • NativeAOT: Inline tls access on linux/x64 #97413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove helper frames #97469
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HW_4A` to `SVE_HW_4B_D` #97433
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CZ_4A to IF_SVE_CZ_4A_L group #97393
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Optimize lsra for MinOpts #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move PendingTypeLoadTable from the ClassLoader object to a global structure #96653
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Various createdump fixes and cleanup #97253
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT and block struct types #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: initial support for reinforcement learning of CSE heuristic #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Late cast expansion: more improvements #2 #97480
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • breaking a string on many lines produce incorrect result if followed by a call #96948
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • [mono] Do not throw in AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata. #96370
    area-System.Reflection, runtime-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Tweak Enumerable.ToArray to reduce some overheads #97458
    area-System.Linq
  • [release/8.0-staging] ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #96847
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • [browser][MT] send cancel to abandoned threads with event loop during mono_exit #97441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [JsonSerializer] Add support for out-of-order metadata reads. #97474
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Do not use AllocHGlobal in Pkcs12Reader #97447
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Move a lock to protect m_pDynamicStaticsInfo #97352
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add additionalSize for the DisableOptData #97479
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono]: Reduce Mono AOT cross compiler x64 memory footprint. #97096
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Code coverage for Server-side OCSP stapling #97099
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix DangerousAddRef usage #97394
    area-System.Security
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Call silent shutdown in case `CloseAsync` failed. #96807
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use Binary Search Tree for Frozen Collections length buckets strategy #94768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Test TotalOrderIeee754ComparerTests: Fix NFloat - NaN testcases for RISC-V #97340
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` correct `HashCode` ranges of skipped unicodes #97351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [RISC-V] Fix errors in crosgen2 for risc-v #97368
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix: unmanaged memory leak on parsing ill-formed certificates #93647
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • [PERF] Remove Mono Android Device Startup testing from performance testing. #97484
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Tests on ARM segfaulted #1517
  • iOS support #700
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Does dotnet/runtimelab want to host WIT code gen issues #2409

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not create useless 'alloca's for shadow locals #2495

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable warn-as-error for libraries tests in CI #2494
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Two flaky tests that need investigated #38268
  • Configure SAC to disabled upon install #38256
  • Ignore transitive packages if satisfied by framework reference #38255
  • Dependencies missing from publish output when library uses different target framework #38252

Closed

  • GenAPI drops ref keyword when generating reference source for System.Memory/4.5.5 #38166

PullRequests

Created

  • [Issue #37501] Verbosity Options default to `minimal` from `quiet` #38277
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Static web assets] Unskip test #38261
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38270
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip flaky tests #38269
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38237
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Allow for GenAPI to include additional API #38232
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2361514 #38207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: BinaryCompatOnlyAttribute #7706
  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish notes from extensions WG 2024-01-25 #7874
  • Collection expressions: only require Add method if collection expression has elements #7873
  • Minor update to CLs WG notes #7872

Updated

  • Interceptors open issues for C# 13 #7835
  • Add native lock speclet #7849
  • Params parameters are implicitly `scoped` #7868
  • Update `Metadata` section in params-collections.md #7850
  • Collection expressions: spread conditional expression #7864
  • Update ref struct interfaces based on LDM discussions #7865

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve intellisense with grouping by method name #71806
  • Interceptor for Code Navigation for Source Generators #71805
  • Show minimum size of class/struct type as hint when hovering for C# #71804
  • Quick actions and refactoring - generate exception class creates obsolete code #71803
  • Extract interface feature shall be able to replace/update existing file #71802
  • [C# / VB]`string` and `char` constants are not embedded as literals in string interpolation #71801

Closed

  • Collection expression spreads on arrays can result in variance exceptions #71720
    17.10
  • Update roslyn syntax list constructs to support collection expressions. #71596
  • The SyntaxGenerator omits abstract modifier for event declarations #66966
    17.10
  • IDE0051 and IDE0052 are slow #67855
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Append chars more efficiently when creating strings #71812
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Append chars more efficiently when creating doc comment IDs #71811
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use collection expressions for empty collections #71810
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use collection expressions for empty collections #71808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Load Roslyn DevKit assemblies into the default ALC #71807
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary temporary builders when creating syntax lists. #71799
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix System.Data.SqlClient version alert #71809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove dependency on IFindUsageContext from DefinitionItemExtensions #71795
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup VSIX asset inclusion #71782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Check Frame's VSFPROPID_IsDocDataInitialized before Getting DocData #71102
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets: Make postfix `for` and `forr` snippets available for types with `Length` or `Count` property #71748
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce ImmutableArray allocations around AssemblyIdentity #71783
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Prefer converting to ReadOnlySpan for spread optimization when we do not need to write #71733
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: synthesize single-element list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update our syntax list types to be "collection builder" types. #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Upstream changes from Vertical Build PoC #71666
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator not generating event field modifiers correctly #71739
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Make dynamic nullable if its type was annotated to be nullable when generating its type syntax #71813
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.10
  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use ParamCollectionAttribute to mark params collections in metadata #71747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Change WriteEvent calls to WriteEventCore #71785
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initial proposal for artifacts #71781
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add native lock feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only parse a single document when freezing documents with related linked files #71750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • More granular JSExceptions for JSInterop #53620
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #53617
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, endpoint, fortunes_ef #53616
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction, plaintext #53615
  • Perf improvement: https, mvc, plainTextWithFilter #53614
  • Add Metrics for Blazor #53613
  • .net8 UsePathBase fails to change the pathbase #53612
  • MVC Razor/Blazor Component Validation #53611
  • HttpClient behaves differently between Blazor Server and Blazor WebAssembly Projects with regard to Cookies #53609
  • Enhanced nav: support redirections triggered by non-Blazor code #53606
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Enhanced nav: support forceLoad #53605

Closed

  • System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException: 'The payload was invalid. For more information go to http://aka.ms/dataprotectionwarning' #39958
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #53618
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext, single_query #53548
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #53553
  • Web analytics and diagnostics #5461
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct, ApiCrudListProducts #53495
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #53537
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextSansFilter #53536
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mvc, plaintext #53549
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #53552
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #53555
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #53557
  • ASP0023 Ambiguous route warning when targeting .NET 8 and using token [action] or [controller] in [Http*] or [Route] attributes #49777
    8.0.x
  • Release the ReportViewer source code under a permissive license #51187
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Correctly encode non-ASCII characters in redirect URL #53623
    area-blazor
  • Update startvscode.cmd #53607
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate route detection of actions with route parameters #53604
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Fix duplicate route detection of actions with route parameters #53545
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Bump update-dotnet-sdk to v3.1.2 #53603
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #53539
    area-dataprotection
  • Change nullability annotation of HostString.Value to explictly allow null #53568
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Enable regex constraint on the Blazor router #53533
    area-blazor
  • Draft: Support null values in Results/TypedResults #49588
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53486
    area-signalr
  • Adding retry to POST_ServerAbort_ClientReceivesAbort #53293
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix closing SignalR Websocket connection on server close #53408
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Cannot Build #4473
  • [gcdump] objects are sometimes missing from Android dumps #4477

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cascading memory leak when StrokeShape is set via a global style on Border control #20163
  • Service Releases - Early Access + General Availability #20159
    Backlog
  • VerticalStackLayout BackgroundColor is ignored #20157
  • Border has a 1 pixel thickness even when it's thickness property is set to 0. #20156
  • DropGestureRecognier.Drop Event is not Triggered #20153
  • Actualizacion de la interfaz #20151
  • iOS app crashes on release mode when performing a .Sum on a List of 20k+ items #20150
  • Label text with HorizontalOptions="Center" is not centered when breaking onto more than one line #20149

Closed

  • Android: LineBreakMode="WordWrap" not working when label in popup on a row in a multi-row grid - 8.0.7-nightly.9897 #20092
    .NET 8 SR2
  • My firstMAUI APP PROJECT CRASHED WITH THE ERROR The program '[4376] MyFirstMauiApp.exe' has exited with code 2147942405 (0x80070005). OS Version : Windows 10 pro 22H2 #19974
  • Strange shadows of Popup on MAC #20003
  • Random black screen in MAUI Blazor. #19588
  • CollectionView does not select an element with a Frame as DataTemplate #8416
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Something is collecting the styles #15054
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • iOS Next Entry to skip hidden parents #20160
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Update versions #20158
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Throw error when pushing without wrapping into navigation page #20155
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Updated Shell Foreground colour #20152
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨

Merged

  • Update GitInfo.txt to 8.0.7-preview #20161
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Reset the xaml in the Sandbox MainPage.xaml #20082
    area/docs 📓

Updated

  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Add animated GIF support for Image on iOS #19411
    area/image :framed_picture:, stale
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Fix page swap from background #19532

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stop using materializer expression in query #32923

Closed

  • Error in use AddInterceptors with AddDbContextPool #32879
  • How to Increase the Size of VARCHAR results of OPENJSON in EF Core 8 Contains Query #32913
  • Cannot delete the db file after calling DbContext.Database methods - EF Core 7.0.11 #32882
  • Is there any example of a C# entity that can use SqlServerUdtTypeMapping for attribute/column mapping? #32862
  • Change detection ignores casing when applying an Index #32855
  • Advice on implementing change management on ef core entities #32818
  • Getting System.InvalidOperationException: 'The 'Point' property '{0}' could not be mapped to the database type 'geography' #32802
  • Contains in LINQ queries - invalid escape character #32798
  • How to Get Case Sensitive Primary Keys #32794
  • Default to MigrationsAssembly for migrations add (if specified) #32791
  • Runtime Error in .NET8 App - Cannot Create DbSet for 'ApplicationUser' #32743
  • Adding related identity issues Update command instead of Insert with entity.HasKey(e => e.OtherId) setting #32728
  • Using these could lead to Memory Leak? #32678
  • Detect Many to Many Relation Not Configured as Such #32677
  • EF Core 7 `System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'second')` #32881
  • IOrderedQueryable projection to record throw exception #32874
  • Primary key datatype change does not consider dropping primary key constraint in generated script #32864
  • Unmodified Custom T4 template scaffolding fails with missing definition for "GetRequiredUsings" method #32848
  • StartsWith generates incorrect sql when DbType is AnsiStringFixedLength #32771
  • Shadow Concurrency Token of owned Type in TPH Hierarchy is not set automatically. #32720
  • How to use Fluent Api using Many to many with backingfield without extra class #32639

PullRequests

Created

  • Support empty strings in primitive collection columns #32924
  • Updating Microsoft.CodeAnalysis version to 4.8 #32922
    blocked
  • Don't assume that FK of skip navigation is non-null #32920
  • [release/8.0] Stop using case-insensitive comparisons for indexed properties (#32899) #32919
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3

Merged

  • stackalloc for BytesToDecimal #31190
    community-contribution
  • Use SqlClient 5.2 preview 5 #32918

Updated

  • Generate change-tracking delegates in the compiled model. #31443
  • Add fill factor to keys and unique constraints #32900
    blocked
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #32897

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Update list of assembly exclusions #18400
  • Pass a few switches to the orchestrator #18398
  • Add preview 1 to the table #18392
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18383

Merged

  • Don't set PortableBuild=... on non source-build #18395
  • Update SDK baseline and exclusions #18374
  • Fix casing of cloaked file path #18387
  • [main] Add Blue Oak license to allow list #18385
  • Add Blue Oak license to allow list #18372
